keywords.value: The Book of Yokai: Mysterious Creatures of Japanese Folklore (Book)
keywords.name: creative_works

lead_paragraph: Several books offer the histories of the fantastical monsters known as yokai that have influenced generations of Americans through a steady stream of Japanese cultural imports.

headline.main: Reviving Japan’s Dreaded and Beloved Ghosts

snippet: Several books offer the histories of the fantastical monsters known as yokai that have influenced generations of Americans through a steady stream of Japanese cultural imports.
abstract: Number of books are being published in United States on subject of monsters of Japanese lore known collectively as yokai; The Book of Yokai: Mysterious Creatures of Japanese Folklore by Michael Dylan Foster, Yurei: The Japanese Ghost by Zack Davisson, Yokai Character Collection by Michael Goldstein and The Hour of Meeting Evil Spirits by Matthew Meyer all owe debt to steady recent stream of Japanese cultural imports.
